attributes.action: Extend the use of lie detectors from just benefit claimants to include politicians when speaking in Parliament or on TV interviews.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Hutton, the Work and Pensions Secretary, has announced plans to use "voice risk analysis software" (a lie detector) on people who wish to claim benefits on the grounds it will save millions of pounds by eliminating false claims.

As MPs are responsible for literally billions of pounds of our money, I believe they should submit themselves to the same scrutiny when answering questions or addressing the public.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
